title: Golden Gate Bridge
description: A famous suspension bridge connecting San Francisco Bay and the Pacific Ocean.

title: Alcatraz Island
description: A small island developed with facilities for a lighthouse, a military fortification, and a prison.

title: Fisherman's Wharf
description: A bustling waterfront area with shops, restaurants, and attractions.

title: Chinatown
description: A historic area featuring vibrant markets, shops, and restaurants.
